CustomField.description: Calculates the remaining amount of Effort in hours (Total Planned Effort less Actual Effort).
CustomField.formula: IF ( inspire1__Total_Planned_Effort__c = 0, inspire1__Planned_Effort__c - inspire1__Actual_Effort__c, inspire1__Total_Planned_Effort__c - inspire1__Actual_Effort__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculates the remaining amount of Effort in hours (Total Planned Effort less Actual Effort).
CustomField.label: Remaining Effort
